weko_file_added: A user added a draft file to a WEKO index in a project
weko_file_removed: A user removed a draft file from a WEKO index in a project
weko_index_linked: A user linked a WEKO index to a project
weko_folder_created: A user created a draft folder in WEKO in a project
weko_item_deposited: A user deposit item in a WEKO index in a project
weko_node_authorized: A user authorized the WEKO addon for a project
weko_node_deauthorized: A user deauthorized the WEKO addon for a project
weko_node_deauthorized_no_user: WEKO addon for a project deauthorized
